title: 1x1, w/d in unit, Fitness center, Apply Today!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
That’s what we at Sofi Waterford Park strive to achieve for our community each and every day.
An oasis of landscaping beauty tucked into downtown San Jose, Sofi Waterford Park’s much-coveted location also grants you access to all of Silicon Valley.
We’re located right next to Capitol Expressway with quick access to 87, 85, 101, and 280 freeways.
That puts the best of downtown San Jose is all within a short driving distance from the property!
We’re also a five-minutes from the 901 bus line and close to the Capitol Caltrain stop.
If you feel like staying in, Sofi Waterford Park boasts a long list of luxury amenities such as a resident lounge, yoga room, and private balconies and patios for each apartment.
Want to get in a quick workout?
Hop by one of our two on-site fitness studios.
Or throw a BBQ get-together with your friends and neighbors at any one of our many poolside grilling stations.
Working from home, cramming for finals, or just need somewhere to go that’s quiet?
Stop by our business center with wifi and work in peace.
Then, when you’re ready for a break, take a dip in one of our three resort-inspired pools and spas.
Sofi Waterford Park offers one, two, and three bedroom apartments for rent in San Jose.
You simply can’t beat our location.
You’ll love being able to escape north to San Francisco at your leisure.
And if you want a simple night out, the West Wind Capitol Drive-In is right down the street.
All this, wrapped up in our cozy little oasis here at Sofi Waterford Park.
For more information, please contact our leasing office.
We look forward to meeting you!

To see our upscale amenities for yourself, schedule your personalized tour of Sofi Waterford Park today.

We are now offering in person tours!
Self guided and virtual tours are still available.
Our entire leasing process from viewing available homes, executing your lease, to moving in, will all be done safely and in adherence to all social distancing guidelines.
Our leasing team is available to support your needs in our office, via phone, email and video during normal business hours.
We look forward to meeting you and helping you find your new home!
